title: Mango overnight oats
time: Hands-on time 15 min, plus overnight soaking
description: These vegan overnight oats use a tin of mango purée for an intensely fruity flavour – it’s something a little bit different to tuck in to in the morning. Top with a mix of nuts and seeds for extra crunch and fibre.
ingredients: Passion fruit seeds and the pulp, toasted chopped pistachios, pomegranate seeds, mixed seeds, to serve

method.Step 1: In a large bowl, mix the jumbo rolled oats with the dairy-free milk, the tin of mango pulp, grated apple and 125ml cold water.

method.Step 2: Stir in the dairy-free yogurt, then cover and chill overnight or for up to 3 days.

method.Step 3: To serve, divide among bowls, then top with passion fruit seeds and the pulp, toasted chopped pistachios, pomegranate seeds and mixed seeds, as you like
